sentence.Network_en: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

sentence.Network_en: Duke of Venice. Write from us to him ; post - post - haste dispatch.
sentence.Network_cn: 公爵替我写一封十万火急的信给他.

sentence.Network_en: She went post - haste to the bank and cashed the cheque.
sentence.Network_cn: 她急忙赶到银行,把支票兑换成现金.

list.abs: We went home in post haste ., 我们急急忙忙地赶回家去.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from the direction ‘haste, post, haste’, formerly given on letters

entry.def: If you go somewhere or do something post-haste, you go there or do it as quickly as you can.

example.ex: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
example.tran: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

means.word_mean: 1. as fast as possible; with all possible haste;
